Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using Human Umbilical Vein Endothelial Cells (HUVEC).

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_015378.4:c.3496T>C (p.Q1166P) resulted in a complete absence of peroxisomes.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Healthy, wild-type cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells with the knockout of the PMPCA2 gene were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Not applicable as it is a qualitative assay.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Presence of peroxisomes visible under the microscope.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Absence or significant reduction in the number of peroxisomes visible under the microscope.
